site.name: Shanoory Flora
site.description: Exquisite floral arrangements and wedding decorations that transform your special day into an unforgettable celebration of love and beauty.

seo.title: Shanoory - Luxury Wedding Floral Design
seo.description: Transform your wedding with breathtaking floral arrangements. Luxury wedding florals, bouquets, ceremony decor, and reception styling by Shanoory.

hero.description: We create breathtaking floral experiences that transform your wedding into an enchanting celebration of love, beauty, and timeless elegance.

intro.headline: Where Flowers Meet Forever
intro.description: At Shanoory, we believe every love story deserves to be adorned with nature's most beautiful creations. With over a decade of experience in luxury wedding floral design, we transform your vision into stunning botanical masterpieces that capture the essence of your unique romance.

features.description: Each arrangement is meticulously handcrafted by our expert florists with an eye for detail and design excellence.

features.description: We take time to understand your vision, style, and love story to create florals that truly reflect you.

features.title: Stress-Free Experience
features.description: From consultation to installation, we handle every detail so you can focus on enjoying your special day.

services.headline: Full-Service Wedding Florals
services.description: From intimate elopements to grand celebrations, we offer comprehensive floral services tailored to your unique vision and style.

items.description: Transform your ceremony space with breathtaking arches, aisle arrangements, and altar pieces that set the perfect scene.

items.title: Reception Styling
items.description: Elegant centerpieces, table runners, and statement installations that create an unforgettable dining experience.

items.title: Full Wedding Styling
items.description: Complete floral design from ceremony to reception, including personal flowers, installations, and day-of setup.

testimonials.headline:
We're proud to deliver florals
that couples consistently love.

items.name: Sarah M.
items.quote: Absolutely stunning work! The ceremony arch took our breath away, and every single arrangement was perfect. Shanoory truly understood our vision and brought it to life beautifully.

items.name: Emily R.
items.quote: Working with Shanoory was a dream! They transformed our venue into a romantic paradise. The centerpieces were stunning and my bridal bouquet was exactly what I envisioned.

items.name: Jessica K.
items.quote: Great value for the quality. Beautiful tropical arrangements, and the team was so close by. Ideal choice for our destination wedding.

items.name: Amanda L.
items.quote: Perfect florals for our rustic theme! The wildflower arrangements were minutes away from what I'd dreamed of, and everything was cozy and elegant. Love it!

items.name: Rachel T.
items.quote: Such beautiful arrangements! The altar flowers were great, the ceremony was quiet and elegant, and Shanoory made check-in super easy. Communication was smooth and stress-free!

items.name: Michael B.
items.quote: Superhost service all the way. The florals were beautiful, communication was instant, and we felt right at home from the start. The atmosphere was so welcoming. Five stars!

items.name: William N.
items.quote: Stylish arrangements with everything we needed. The team was quick to respond, making planning super easy. Would recommend to anyone getting married!

items.name: Julian D.
items.quote: Fantastic florals! Cozy, beautiful, and perfectly located. The photos don't do it justice – it's even better in person. Everything was so comfortable and well-prepared!

items.name: Scarlett A.
items.quote: Wonderful experience from start to finish! The arrangements were spotless, elegant, and had everything we needed. The team was friendly and responsive throughout.

faq.headline: Common Questions
faq.description: Everything you need to know about working with us for your wedding florals.

items.question: How far in advance should I book?
items.answer: We recommend booking 6-12 months before your wedding date to ensure availability, especially for peak wedding season (May-October). However, we occasionally have openings for shorter timelines, so don't hesitate to reach out.

items.question: What is your pricing structure?
items.answer: Our wedding packages start at $2,500 for intimate celebrations and scale based on your vision, guest count, and floral selections. We provide detailed proposals after our initial consultation to ensure complete transparency.

items.question: Do you offer setup and breakdown?
items.answer: Yes! All our packages include professional delivery, setup, and styling on your wedding day. We also offer next-day pickup for rental items like vases and arches.

items.question: Can you work with my wedding planner?
items.answer: Absolutely! We love collaborating with wedding planners and venues to ensure seamless coordination. We're experienced in working with various professionals to bring your vision to life.

items.question: What if my flowers aren't in season?
items.answer: We'll discuss seasonal availability during your consultation and suggest beautiful alternatives that achieve your desired look. We work with premium suppliers to source the best blooms year-round.

items.question: Do you do destination weddings?
items.answer: Yes! We've styled destination weddings across the country and internationally. Travel fees apply and are discussed upfront. We coordinate with local vendors to ensure fresh, beautiful flowers arrive perfectly.

items.question: What is your cancellation policy?
items.answer: We understand that plans can change. Deposits are non-refundable, but we offer flexible rescheduling options. Full details are provided in our contract.
